Articles.Content:
And they dont seem to be good....  

[Snipped by moderator]

[Snipped by moderator]

Its not KSP. But these are the people who're publishing it now. I dont wish to jump to conclusions. But how does the KSP community feel about having these people on board? What does it mean for the modding community here? Are we in for a sea of future micro transactions? Has this thread already been beaten to death? If so my apologizes.
already a thread for it
